summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, requesting the name of an accountant that was previously mentioned by Tom McGraw. The email emphasizes the confidentiality of the communication and includes a disclaimer regarding its privileged nature.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, requesting information about an accountant.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein, who is being asked to resend information.

persons.name: Tom McGraw
persons.context: Tom McGraw is mentioned as the source of the accountant's name that Epstein is requesting.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is reaching out to Jes Staley for information, indicating a level of familiarity.
Tom McGraw is referenced as a source of information regarding an accountant.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is requesting the name of an accountant from Jes Staley.
Tom McGraw is mentioned as the person who previously provided the accountant's name.
The email contains a confidentiality disclaimer indicating it may be attorney-client privileged.
The communication is marked as confidential and unauthorized use is prohibited.
